meanings.definition: To receive as compensation for work or services.
meanings.sent1: She earned money by babysitting for her neighbors.
meanings.sent2: He earns a paycheck every two weeks for his job at the store.
meanings.sent3: The dog earned a treat for fetching the ball so quickly.
meanings.sent4: The student earned praise from the teacher for completing the project on time.
meanings.sent5: The athlete earned a gold medal for winning the race.

meanings.definition: To acquire through effort or action.
meanings.sent1: They earned the respect of their peers by always being honest.
meanings.sent2: She earned a reputation for being a hard worker in the office.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel earned a nut by cleverly outsmarting the bird.
meanings.sent4: The explorer earned his title by discovering new lands.
meanings.sent5: The artist earned recognition for her beautiful paintings.
